FuncDef: The display rip bfd session command displays information about BFD sessions.
CLIs: display rip <process-id> bfd session { all | interface { <interface-name> | <interface-type> <interface-number> } | <neighbor-address4> }

ParaDef.Info:
Displays information about BFD sessions in a specified RIP process.
The value is an integer ranging from 1 to 4294967295.

Displays all information about BFD sessions in a specified RIP process.
-

Displays information about BFD sessions on the specified interface.
-

Displays information about BFD sessions on a neighbor with a specified ID.
The value is in dotted decimal notation.

ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
To check information about BFD sessions, including the local and remote IP addresses, BFD status, and BFD parameters, run the display rip bfd session command.
